Treasury Design System

  1. Home
  2. Visual style

Typography

The U.S. Web Design Standards (developed by GSA-18F) recommends a font system that uses two open-source font families: Source Sans Pro and Merriweather, both of which are designed for legibility and can beautifully adapt to a variety of visual styles.

Typeface

Source Sans Pro is an open-source sans-serif typeface created for legibility in UI design. With a variety of weights that read easily at all sizes, Source Sans Pro provides clear headers as well as highly-readable body text.
